> 
> 
> On 5/7/2023 at 5:49 AM, ColdJ said:
> 
> 
> Whoever made the internal for this model, has accidentally put the empties (a floating point in the 3d internal model that have a defined orientation) that let the game know where to place the seated kerbals and in what direction, in the wrong place and orientation. If you have access to to Blender/BforArtists3 with the .mu plugin installed, then it can be adjusted and saved as a new internal model, you then just make sure the config file uses the newly named model.
> 

Thanks a bunch man!

> 
> 
> On 8/5/2021 at 5:03 AM, Tommy0604 said:
> 
> 
> with the new texture changes the mk3 docking ports are now plain white and the mapping for the textures has also changed, I hope there will be a fix in the next version
> 

Unfortunately it is still white, same as the <abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster">SRB</abbr>

Nice Work!

> On 6/12/2015 at 1:21 PM, Dr. Jet said:
> 
> 
> Mk3 Science Lab? There is no single mod that provides us with horisontally oriented Science Lab.
> 

I thought the same thing so I created one., just now released it as I just came to the forums.

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedauthorid="233250" data-embedcontent="" data-embedid="embed6833106922" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/topic/224411-mk3-science-10/?do=embed&comment=4379278&embedComment=4379278&embedDo=findComment#comment-4379278" style="height:264px;max-width:502px;"></iframe>

Running this with ReStock breaks the textures on the following parts: SB-4 Taurus, SB-6E Minotaur, SI-3 Atlas, Clamp-O-Tron Mk3, MK3 Sheilded Docking Port and Mk3 Inline Clamp-O-Tron.  

This is especially weird considering it doesn't do anything to the MK2 expansion parts. Here's a picture of them, with the exception of the shielded port. Any idea as to what's going on?  

![image.png?ex=66301b6a&is=661da66a&hm=2f812d71388f21e07290502d73c59b87272bda8f7bc31bab3f6c0aaaad5fc25d&](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1228700319941263420/1229555093032931329/image.png?ex=66301b6a&is=661da66a&hm=2f812d71388f21e07290502d73c59b87272bda8f7bc31bab3f6c0aaaad5fc25d&)

> 
> 
> 7 hours ago, Gregory SpanKerman said:
> 
> 
> Running this with ReStock breaks the textures on the following parts: SB-4 Taurus, SB-6E Minotaur, SI-3 Atlas, Clamp-O-Tron Mk3, MK3 Sheilded Docking Port and Mk3 Inline Clamp-O-Tron.  
> 
> This is especially weird considering it doesn't do anything to the MK2 expansion parts. Here's a picture of them, with the exception of the shielded port. Any idea as to what's going on?  
> 
> [![image.png?ex=66301b6a&is=661da66a&hm=2f812d71388f21e07290502d73c59b87272bda8f7bc31bab3f6c0aaaad5fc25d&](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1228700319941263420/1229555093032931329/image.png?ex=66301b6a&is=661da66a&hm=2f812d71388f21e07290502d73c59b87272bda8f7bc31bab3f6c0aaaad5fc25d&)](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1228700319941263420/1229555093032931329/image.png?ex=66301b6a&is=661da66a&hm=2f812d71388f21e07290502d73c59b87272bda8f7bc31bab3f6c0aaaad5fc25d& "Enlarge image")
> 

As far as i know, this is not an issue with Restock, but with the mod using old Stock textures that were moved/removed in later updates and the mod not being updated to deal with that.

If you take a look back in the thread, you might find the fix, it's a simple patch i think

I myself use restock and this mod together, and they work fine

**Edited <time datetime="2024-04-16T05:41:45Z" title="04/16/2024 05:41  AM" data-short="Apr 16">April 16</time> by Davi SDF**

[@Gregory SpanKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/233317-gregory-spankerman/) I just did a fresh install with both Mk3 Expansion and Restock and I noticed the same issues with the SRBs and the docking port textures, as well as the <abbr title="Liquid Fuel"><abbr title="Liquid Fuel">LF</abbr></abbr>/O tanks in the service bay. I tested the patch mentioned a few pages back that modifies certain parts and adds deprecated  textures to a custom whitelist, and it seems it no longer works as [@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/) fixed the texture issues an update or two ago.

I did however find this -

> 
> 
> On 2/16/2022 at 10:49 AM, krautbernd12 said:
> 
> 
> The whitelist is missing the Clampotron Sr. texture. Adding:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Squad/Parts/Utility/dockingPortSr/ClampotronSr\_ClampotronSr\_Diffuse.dds
> 
> 
> 
> 
> to the whitelist file fixes the texture issues for me.
> 

After a certain amount of trial and error (mostly error), I did some digging in the parts configs for the SRBs and the service bay and I found the remaining missing textures.  So by adding these items to your whitelist along with the Clampotron one quoted, it should fix the issues with Restock.

Squad/Parts/Engine/MassiveSRB/solid\_booster\_cm.dds  

Squad/Parts/Engine/MassiveSRB/solid\_booster\_em.dds  

Squad/Parts/FuelTank/mk3Fuselage/Mk3Fuselage.dds  

Squad/Parts/FuelTank/FoilTanks/RadialTanks.dds

Hope it helps!

Hello [@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/),

<abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr> Chine Cap has thruster power 60, while other <abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr> Segments have thruster power 6, is it a bug ?

I am pretty sure its on my end, but some textures are missaglined. Some parts that have this are the mk3 docking ports and all the mk3 SRBs and a few others. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling but that didnt work. If you know what to do please let me know. 

I have had this issue for a while.
